item.title: My Vision and Mission
item.description: While working on our vision and mission at work, I found asking myself: And what exactly are my vision and mission? The answer surprised me.

item.title: Card or Player: Who Wins Poker Games?
item.description: … and other counter-intuitive lessons from working 18 months on developing and executing SRGÂ SSR’s technology strategy.
